dict.acceptation: 左，左面；[军]左翼；左派，激进分子；
离开( leave的过去式和过去分词)；

sent.orig: 'Left, left,'says he; 'keep to your left hand, mate Jim!
sent.trans: “向左，向左，”他说，“向左边跑，吉姆，好伙计！

sent.orig: Dogleg left, aim left for tee shot, but beware all the way OB on the left.
sent.trans: 左狗腿，开球贴着树边打，第二杆要注意左边有OB,右边有水。

sent.orig: To pull out right (left) bronchi, patience face partial left (right) , left (right) shoulder down.
sent.trans: 抽右（左）支气管，病患脸偏左（右）、左（右）肩向下。

sent.orig: Dogleg left, tee shot over the cliff, for long hitter, aim left. Second downhill.
sent.trans: 左狗腿，先过崖，再下斜，够距离的话，开球就向左一些打。

sent.orig: Left sinus of valsalva was devoid of left coronary artery.
sent.trans: 左冠状窦内无左冠状动脉起源。
